properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Dyer, TN; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN; Mississippi, AR
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 12:35PM CST until February 24 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Mississippi River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Caruthersville
* from Tuesday February 11 until Sunday February 23.
* At 12 PM Saturday the stage was 28.8 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 36.0 feet on Tuesday February 18.
* Flood stage is 32.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Tuesday February 11 and
continue to rise to near 36.0 feet by Tuesday February 18.The river
will fall below flood stage by Sunday February 23.
* At 36.0 feet...Grain terminal area east of Blytheville, Arkansas is
flooding. In Tennessee, overbank flooding from the river is cutting
across the Barr Point. Suggs Road is flooded through the low spots.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Sunday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
